alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 22 at 5:48AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues to be possible. * WHERE...The following areas, the Northeast Gulf Coast and portions of the eastern Gulf Coast. This includes the cities of Yakutat, Elfin Cove, And Pelican. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Flooding may occur in poor drainage areas. Extensive street flooding is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rain may fall on a deep primed snowpack leading to the melt increasing. Flows in rivers may increase quickly and reach critical levels.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
